price: 59. Leur succédèrent alors des générations qui négligèrent la prière et suivirent leurs désirs. Ceux-là courront à leur perte.
arabic: ۞ فَخَلَفَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡ خَلۡفٌ أَضَاعُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَٱتَّبَعُواْ ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَلۡقَوۡنَ غَيًّا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fakhalafa min baʿdihim khalfun aḍāʿū al-ṣalata wa-ittabaʿū al-shahawāti fasawfa yalqawna ghayyan
